column2: I must protest in the strongest possible terms my profound opposition to the newly instituted practice which imposes severe and intolerable restrictions upon the ingress and egress of senior members of the hierarchy and will
column4: should the current deplorable innovation be perpetuated
column5: precipitate a constriction of the channels of communication
column6: and culminate in a condition of organisational atrophy and administrative paralysis
column7: which will render effectively impossible the coherent and co-ordinated discharge of the function of government within Her Majesty's United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland .

column1: Hacker: You mean you've lost your key?
